text: Phyllodytes amadoi is a frog. It lives in Brazil. It lives in the rainforest. Scientists have only seen it in one place, in Bahia, but they think it lives in other places too. This frog is smaller than other frogs in Phyllodytes. The adult frog is 15.6-23.0 mm long from nose to rear end. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Phyllodytes amadoi
